topics.title: Algorithm
content: Step-by-step procedure to solve a problem.
Characteristics: Finite, Definite, Input, Output, Effective.

topics.title: Advantages of Algorithm
content: Easy to understand, helps debugging, blueprint for programs.

topics.title: Disadvantages of Algorithm
content: Time consuming, complex for big problems.

topics.title: Examples
content: Find largest of two numbers, Find sum of numbers.

topics.title: Flowchart
content: Diagram showing process steps with symbols & arrows.

topics.title: Advantages of Flowcharts
content: Visual, easy to debug, good for documentation.

topics.title: Disadvantages of Flowcharts
content: Large for complex programs, hard to modify.
